name: Project Boomerang - Instagram.com
description:
WHY THIS?

I started the Boomerang series because I realized that I had done so much work in the past five years that I cannot share with the public, - at least not yet - these works are confidential. So, it is in the best interest of my clients that they remain private.


Also, I got so tired of seeing bad UI everywhere, and I figured that rather than nag or complain, I could just do something to improve the status quo, and build a “nice portfolio” in the process, yeah, I’m petty :)




ABOUT THE PROJECT

Typical projects I work on are quite robust and will take about three to eight months to complete, examples include platforms that have a robust web area, plus two to three, sometimes four dashboard areas - all prototyped to sync perfectly like an engine. :)


The Boomerang projects are not as robust - You are free to think of them as simple, mini-projects, I have made them, following the same approach I take when working on “real-world projects” and I have decided to dedicate about two to five weeks to each of them.


One thing to clarify though is that they are not “Daily UI challenges” I’m not a huge fan of the so-called “Daily UI challenges” :(



WHAT TO NOTE

These designs are living, not static, what this means is that I could come back at any time - especially in the middle of the night - to improve on them, tidy things up, add more screens, etc. - yeah, I’m OCD, deal with it.



BENEFITS

This could be a starting point for your next projects. You could learn from them - for those of you who are still in design school - or just take a sneak peek into my design “process”, break down all I’ve done and build upon my knowledge, honestly? whatever gets your boat rocking.


SUMMARY

I have made a home on dribbble.com/lodnael, I feel a bit lost in Behance, can't put a pin to “why” I hope that changes soon.


Made a home at ko-fi.com/nate as well, for those who’d like to support the project.


So, that’s it, Enjoy!
